author: Mat Smith
title: The Morning After: Are classic Mario games coming to the Switch in 2020?
description:
Hey, good morning! You look fabulous.

For streaming services and games companies, we're all a captive audience at the moment. For Disney+, the newest challenger, it's an opportunity. With lots of kids at home, an almost infinite run of Disney, Pixar, Marvel …
